Translations.Text: Moshi, nise shinja ya kokoro ni yamai no yadoru mono, soshite shichū no sendō-sha-tachi ga,(sono akuji o) tomenakereba, kare-ra ni taishi anata o, karitatete yarou. Sō sureba kono ato, kare-ra ga anata gata no rinjin to shite i rareru no mo, wazuka no madearou
Kare-ra wa kanarazu norowa re, mitsukari shidai torae rare, korosarerudearou
Kore wa mukashi no sugisatta-sha-tachi ni taisuru, arrā no kankōdearu. Arrā no kankō ni wa nani no henkō mo nai
Hitobito wa (shinpan no)-ji ni tsuite anata ni tazuneyou. Itte yaru ga ī. `Hontōni, sono chishiki wa, arrā no omoto ni aru. Dōshite anata ni wakarudarou ka, sonotoki wa chikaidearou
Hontōni arrā wa fushin-sha ni gekido sa re, kare-ra no tame ni rekka o junbi nasa re
kare-ra wa eien ni sono naka ni sumi, gādian mo kyūjo-sha mo miidasenaidearou
Sonohi, kare-ra no kao ga hi no naka de hikkurikaeri, kare-ra wa,`ā , watashi-tachi wa arrā ni shitagai, mata shito ni shitagaeba yokatta.' To iudarou
Mata kare-ra wa iudarou. `Omo yo, watashi-tachi wa, hontōni atama ya kenryoku-sha-tachi ni shitagatte imashita. Kare-ra ga watashi-tachi o,-dō ni mayowa seta nodesu
Omo yo, kare-ra no chōbatsu o 2-bai ni shite, hidoi gekido de kare-ra ni o okori kudasai
Shinkō suru mono yo, mūsā o nayama shita mono no yōdeatte wa naranai. Daga arrā wa kare-ra no itta chūshō kara, kare o kiyome rareta. Arrā no omoto de, kare wa eiyo o atae rarete ita
Shinkō suru mono yo, arrā o osore nasai. (Tsuneni) jitchokuna kotoba de mono o ii nasai
Kare wa anata gata no tame ni sono okonai o kyōsei sa re, moromoro no tsumi o yurusa reru. Arrā to sono shito ni shitagau mono wa, tashika ni idaina kōfuku o jōju suru monodearu

Hontōni ware wa, sho ten to daichi to yamayama ni shintaku o mōshitsuketa. Daga sorera wa sore o, ninau koto o jitai shi, katsu sore ni tsuite osoreta. Ningen wa sore o ninatta. Hontōni (ningen wa) fugideari katsu muchidearu

(Sore de) arrā wa, nise shinja no otoko-tachi to on'na-tachi, mata tashinkyō to no otoko-tachi to on'na-tachi o, shobatsu nasa reru. Daga arrā wa, shinkō suru otoko-tachi to on'na-tachi ni wa, awaremi o kake rareru. Arrā wa kan'yō ni shite jihibukai okata de ara reru
Ten ni ari-chi ni aru su subete no mono o shoyū nasa reru arrā ni tatae are. Raise ni oite mo, tatae hakare no monodearu. Kare wa eimei ni shite subete ni tsūjite ora reru
Kare wa daichi ni hairu mono, mata sore kara deru mono o subete shitte ora re, mata ten kara kudaru mono, narabini soko ni noboru mono subete o shitte ora reru. Kare wa jihibukaku kan'yōde ara reru

Shinkō no nai mono wa,`(shinpan no)-ji wa, watashi-tachi ni wa konaidearou.' To iu. Itte yaru ga ī. `Iya, omo ni chikatte, sore wa kanarazu anata gata ni yattekuru nodearu. Yūgen-kai made mo shitte ora reru omo ni chikatte. Ten ni oite mo ji ni oite mo, mijin no omo-sa demo, kare kara manukare rareru mono wanai. Mata sore yori chīsai mono mo ōkī mono mo, meikakuna sho ni shirusa renai mono wanai
Sore wa kare ga, shinkō shite zenkō o suru mono ni, mukuwa reru tamedearu. Korera no mono ni koso, kan'yō to kandaina onmegumi ga arou
Daga ware no shirushi o munashiku suru tame ni doryoku suru mono, korera no mono ni wa itamashī chōbatsu ga arou
Chishiki o sazukatta mononara,-nushi ga anata ni kudasa reta mono wa shinrideatte, sore ga iryoku aru kata, sanbi subeki hō no michi ni michibiku monodearu koto ga wakarudearou
Fushin-sha-tachi wa (chōshō shite) iu. `Anata gataga konagona ni sa re chirasa reta nochi de, atarashiku sōzō sa reru nado to tsugeru ningen o, oshiemashou ka
Daga kare wa arrā ni tsuite, kyogi o itta no ka. Soretomo kichigai ni natte shimatta to iu no ka. Iya, kare-ra wa raise o shinjinai, chōbatsu no naka ni iru hidoi kokoroechigai no monodearu

Kare-ra wa kare-ra no zengo ni aru ten to ji o minai no ka. Moshi hossurunaraba, ware ga kare-ra o daichi ni noma se, matawa ten'noikkaku o kare-ra no ue ni otosudearou. Hontōni sono nakaniha kaigo shite omoni kaeru shimo be ni totte no shirushi ga aru
